props.filterMode: Apply a specific filter when matching items. **some** is the default, which will return true if any key matches the search term. **every** will return true only if every key matches the search term. The **union** mode will return true if every key matches the search term. The **intersection** mode will return true if any key matches the search term.
props.customKeyFilter: Function used on specific keys within the item object.
props.filterKeys: Array of specific keys to filter on the item.
